summary: After someone is killed in the subterranean project called "Shadowzone," a NASA captain is called in to investigate. In the project, sleeping subjects are induced into a deep EDS state ... See full summary »
cast: Louise Fletcher|David Beecroft|James Hong|Frederick Flynn|Shawn Weatherly|Miguel A. Núñez Jr.|Lu Leonard|Maureen Flaherty|Robbie Rives|Linda V. Carter|David Hicks|Jack Leal|Michael Deak|Julia Mongrain
title: Shadowzone
